CustomField.description: System field set by code. Do not use this field on page layouts or in reports - it will not appear to be accurate to users because of how Salesforce applies User time zone calculations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System field set by code. Do not use this field on page layouts or in reports - it will not appear to be accurate to users because of how Salesforce applies User time zone calculations.
CustomField.label: Event Start Datetime GMT (do not use)
